programme.title: Kurat kolme kuldse juuksekarvaga
Der Teufel mit den drei goldenen Haaren
programme.desc: Vendade Grimmide muinasjutu ainetel vändatud lastefilmi peategelaseks on õnnesärgis sündinud poiss, kellele ennustati, et ta võib abielluda kuninga enda tütrega. Kui kuningas seda kuulis, otsustas ta poisist lahti saada. Ta lubas poisi vanematele, et kasvatab õnnelapse lossis üles, kuid lasi ta hoopis hälliga allavoolu. Õnneks ei kukkunud lapsuke kosest alla, vaid sattus sepa peresse. Kui kuninga ja õnnelapse teed nüüd teist korda ristusid ning kuningas taipas, et poiss ei uppunudki koses, otsustab ta jälle lasta poisi hukata. Õnnetäht aga kaitseb Felixit seegi kord ja nii ei jää kuningal muud üle, kui saata ta kuradi enda juurde.

programme.title: Ninjakunstnik
programme.desc: Täna õpetab Ricky tegema traadist kassi ja kollaažitehnikas käekotti. Samas vaevab teda kogu aeg kahtlus, et üks mannekeen ta kodus on ellu ärganud.

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Roger on paanikas: tema banaaniistandusest on kõik mesilased kadunud! Õnneks oskab Gilbert mesilaste tantsu – tänu sellele avastavad Džungliässad, et nende ammune vaenlane Vladimir kasutab mesilasi ära, et nende vahast enda vahakujusid valmistada.

programme.title: Kohtume Pariisis
programme.desc: Õpilased kardavad, et Armando räägib Blokist proua Carréle. Lena palub Ineselt enne suurt etendust andeks. Henri saabub lõpuks tänapäeva, et Lenat koju viia, kuid Lena ei suuda enam otsustada, kus tema kodu täpselt on.

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Oktonaudid sõidavad tühjale saarekesele vaba päeva nautima ja Melissa otsustab kasutada puhkust surfamiseks. Ta sõbruneb kahe surfava teo, Violetta ja Viktoriga, kuid on sunnitud sõpradele appi tõttama, kui surfareid tabab liiga suur laine.

programme.title: Tipptiivad
programme.desc: Brody peab päästma turbosurfijatest sõbrad, kui nad Laevahuku lahe pöörisesse kinni jäävad.

programme.title: Õnnelik Lazzaro
Lazzaro felice
programme.desc: Poeetiline allegooriline draama, mis mõjusalt põimib kokku erinevad ajaväljad, reaalsuse ja maagilise realismi. Väikeses Itaalia külas, markii de Luna valitsemise all, rabab tubakapõllul tööd suur pere, teiste seas ka noor Lazzaro, kes on sedavõrd siiras ja abivalmis, et teda peetakse lihtsameelseks. Lazzarot on kerge ära kasutada ja ka markiisi pojal Tancredil küpseb siin kaval plaan. Mitmekordselt pärjatud, Kuldse Palmioksa nominatsioon ja parima stsenaariumi auhind Cannes´is. R: Alice Rohrwacher.(n)

programme.title: Kinoteatri MM Katarsis
programme.desc: Kahe õhtuse jalgpalliülekande vahel täidab Kinoteater lüngad jalgpalli mõtestamisel, mis Aet Süvaril, Marek Lemsalul ja Indrek Zelinskil taktikalaua taga kohmitsedes paratamatult sisse jäävad. programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Susapusa ja lapsed lähevad merereisile Vulkaan Viviani saarele, et nautida iga-aastast delfiinide tantsuetendust. Sõule saabuvad linnapea lennukiga ka kõik Okido elanikud. Ootamatult katab paks udu kogu saare, lennuk ei saa maanduda ja kogu üritus satub ohtu. Selgub, et pilv Udupea on külma saanud ja katnud kogu saare udulaamadega.(n)

programme.title: Susapusa Okidos
programme.desc: Susapusa tahab teada, kuidas leiba küpsetatakse. Okidos saab ta teada, et pärm paneb taina kerkima ja annab küpsetistele kohevuse. Susapusa ei jõua oodata ja lisab tainasse liiga palju pärmi.(n)

programme.title: Tipsi ja Tim
programme.desc: Viimaks ometi tunnistasid arstid Tipsi terveks ja ta lubatakse koju. Kahjuks ei möödu kojuminek sekeldusteta.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Miia räägib Saarale, et nägi Kristallkoopa peeglis Saara kujutist – järelikult peab ka Saaral olema võimalik Tsentoopiasse pääseda. Seekord aga läheb Miia siiski üksinda. Kuki ja Lillela haldjad tulevad Kraatrist varju otsima, sest Ööväät on vallutanud kõik peale Mahedate Tuulte mäe. Kas on võimalik, et just seal peitub viimane südamekristall?(n)

programme.title: Indiaanipoiss Yakari
programme.desc: Piisonisilm võtab pähe teha kõike täpselt vastupidi sellele, mida talle öeldakse.(n)

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Täna leiab Trühv Tähekübara kaelakee. Tähekübar arvab aga, et kaelakee on varastatud, ja tõotab süüdlasele karme tagajärgi! Kuidas olukord laheneb?(n)

programme.title: Laulukarusselli kuldne kolmik
programme.desc: Pool aastat pärast Laulukarussell 2015 finaalkontserti käisime Viljandimaal ja Tallinnas, et veelkord kohtuda lauluvõistluse kolme võitjaga. Teie ees on Triinu Johanna Sepp, Vaiko Aasaküla ja Märten Männiste koos pere ning sõpradega. Režissöör Toorion Ojaperv, produtsent Kadi Priske.(n)

programme.title: Väike merineitsi
Die kleine Meerjungfrau
programme.desc: Kaugel avamerel on vesi nii sinine nagu rukkililleõied ja sama läbipaistev kui klaas. Seal, inimeste silmade eest varjul, elavad merekuninga lossis kolm merineitsit, kellel meeldib laintes hullata ja kaladega võidu ujuda. Nende laul on nii kurb ja ilus, et selle kõla äratab inimeste südametes aimamatu igatsuse. Kaks merineitsit on kogu südamest rahul eluga mere põhjas, aga kõige nooremale jääb sellest väheks - ta ihkab endale hinge ja jalgu ning soovib minna elama maa peale kohe nii väga, et on selle nimel kõigeks valmis.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Lily kurvastab, sest järvest on kadunud tema lemmikkalakesed. Alfred hakkab uurima, mis võiks olla nende kadumise taga ja avastab kõigi üllatuseks, et tegelikult ei otsigi nad üldse kalu, vaid hoopis kedagi muud.(n)

programme.title: Magus molekul
programme.desc: Kas tatrast valmistatud küpsetised on tatrapudrumaitselised? Ja kas tatrapadjal magades on unenäod tatrapudru lõhnaga? Kust tuleb üldse eesti keelde nimetus tatar? Ja millist tantsu tantsivad tatratangud? Teadusköögis toimetavad Merle, Aigar ja Oliver.(n)

programme.title: Kohtume Pariisis
programme.desc: Lena teeb tantsus nimelt vigu, et Armando temaga kahekesi proovi teeks ja teised saaks rahulikult Blokiga tegeleda. Thea kinnisidee Lenat paljastada hakkab tema käsilastele muret tegema ja nad teatavad sellest proua Carréle.(n)

programme.title: Ulatage soola
Pass the Salt
programme.desc: Sool on tähtis komponent meie toidulaual, kuid eelmise sajandi 1970. aastatel sattus see põlu alla. Kas sool on tõesti nii ohtlik, nagu väidetakse? Dokumentaalfilmis otsivad teadlased, südamekirurgid, toidutootjad, dieedinõustajad ja kokad vastust nii sellele kui ka teistele soolaga seotud küsimustele.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Martin ja Louise lähevad viljakusnõustamisele. Penhale uurib vandalismijuhtumit ja saab tasuta surfitunni. Caitlin võtab Ali kauplusse tööle. Morwenna vastab oma esimesele väljakutsele.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Proua Tishell võtab lõpparve ja Martin peab saatma Buddy Angela juurde. Al kolib Morwennaga kokku, mis teeb Caitlinile suuremat rõõmu kui Bertile. Louisa saab õppetunni, et klienti ei tohi vastu võtta ilma kellegi juuresolekuta.(n)

programme.title: Doktor Martin
programme.desc: Ruth õpetab Martinit oma kompleksist üle saama. Morwenna ja Ali pulmade ettevalmistusel on tõrkeid. Martin jääb viimase hinnatava ülesandega jänni.(n)

programme.title: Versailles, Päikesekuninga proovikivi
Versailles, les défis du roi Soleil
programme.desc: Kui noor Prantsuse kuningas Louis XIV valib oma uueks elukohaks Versailles', ei ole tal aimugi, millised raskused see endaga kaasa toob. Soovides kogu maailmale oma uue paleega muljet avaldada, paneb ta keerulisse olukorda nii arhitektid, insenerid, ehitajad kui ka terve riigi. Täna suudavad teadlased rekonstrueerida kuninga esialgse visiooni lossist, seletades, kuidas loodi kuulus peeglisaal, millised olid aukartustäratavad jõupingutused kogu lossikompleksi ja aedade ehitamisel ning kuidas kuninga nõudlikke soove kõigest hoolimata teostati.(n)

programme.title: Kool Schreckensteini kindluses
Burg Schreckenstein
programme.desc: Stephan on 11-aastane, tema vanemad on lahutatud ja ta stjuardessist emal pole aega temaga koos õppida. Poissi ähvardab koolist välja langemine ja vanemad otsustavad saata ta poiste internaatkooli. Schreckensteini kool on kõike muud kui tavaline. Esiteks asub see vanas kindluses, teiseks valitseb seal rüütlite vaim ja kolmandaks ootavad kooli uusi asukaid vastuvõtukatsed, mida ei korralda õpetajad, vaid õpilased. Varem on uued pidanud käima päev otsa ringi raudrüüga, kuid Stephani ülesandeks on mängida vemp naabruses asuva tüdrukutekooli õpilastele. Vembul on aga ootamatud tagajärjed.(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli MM 2022
programme.desc: Mängu kommenteerivad Tarmo Tiisler ja Marko Lelov. Jalgpallistuudiot juhib Aet Süvari.(n)

programme.title: Kinoteatri MM Katarsis
programme.desc: Kahe õhtuse jalgpalliülekande vahel täidab Kinoteater lüngad jalgpalli mõtestamisel, mis Aet Süvaril, Marek Lemsalul ja Indrek Zelinskil taktikalaua taga kohmitsedes paratamatult sisse jäävad. Henrik Kalmet ja Tõnis Niinemets uurivad, kas teoreetiliselt oleks FIFA-l üldse võimalik olla korruptiivsem Kohtla-Järve linnavalitsusest. Tegevjalgpallureid õpetab sukelduma, nii platsil kui ka pallimängu nüanssidesse Karl-Andreas Kalmet. Mängude tulemusi ennustab kaheksajalg Kait Kall. Juulikuus lumi on maas ja novembris on jalgpalli MM!(n)

programme.title: Jalgpalli MM 2022
programme.desc: Alagrupiturniiri teine mängudevoor viib vastamisi Ameerika kontinendi kaks tugevat jalgpalliriiki. Kui Mehhiko polnud MM-valikturniiril ehk tavapärases hoos, siis Argentina on viimase nelja aasta jooksul kaotanud vaid üksikud mängud.(n)

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: Seven strangers, each holding a secret, meet at at Lake Tahoe's El Royale, a hotel with a dark past, and over one fateful night everyone will have a chance of salvation before everything goes to hell.

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: After an injury ends her career, world-class skier Molly Bloom starts running an exclusive underground poker empire, but she soon lands herself in trouble after the FBI exposes her operation.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their family's ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Bad Times at the El Royale
programme.desc: Seven strangers, each holding a secret, meet at at Lake Tahoe's El Royale, a hotel with a dark past, and over one fateful night everyone will have a chance of salvation before everything goes to hell.

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Emily arrives in Miami, with big dreams of becoming a professional dancer. She meets Sean, who leads a dancing crew. They discover that Emily's father, a wealthy businessman, plans to demolish the neighborhood as part of a development plan, and she has to stand up against her father in order to protect their neighborhood, all expressed through their dancing.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: After his team leaves him behind, Sean catches wind of a dance competition that could change everything for him. He sets out to create a new team, recruiting faces old and new, only to discover that he will be facing off against his old team in the competition.

programme.title: Step Up China
programme.desc: In the heart of the Chinese city of Beijing, a group of young people who are passionate about dancing come together to form the best dance team in China and become a family.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: With his career going down the drain, a famous singer, Jack, manages to inspire a struggling artist, Ally, to persist in pursuing a singing career. Struggling with his own demons, Jack's newfound romance with Ally is put on the line with her star shining bright as his begins to dim.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: “The FootLoose” is a recreation of the original movie in 1984, which narrates the story of a young boy “Rayan” who comes back to his village after a long departure, only to find that singing and dancing are no more allowed, because of the tragic death of five teenagers some years ago. Although Rayan falls in love with Ariel, who similarly adores singing and dancing, yet he is shocked again once more when he realizes that her father -the priest- is one of the strongest supporters of the anti singing and dancing decision. Hence the young couple determines to rebel and encourage everyone else to do the same.(n)

programme.title: Step Up Revolution
programme.desc: Emily arrives in Miami, with big dreams of becoming a professional dancer. She meets Sean, who leads a dancing crew. They discover that Emily's father, a wealthy businessman, plans to demolish the neighborhood as part of a development plan, and she has to stand up against her father in order to protect their neighborhood, all expressed through their dancing.(n)

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: The night after Romulus Augustus is crowned, barbarian general Odoacer leads a coup to seize control of the Western Roman Empire. Forced to flee, young Romulus and his loyal companions make their way to Britannia to find the last loyal legion so they can take back the throne.(n)

programme.title: Alex & Emma
programme.desc: Alex's only way to get out of a financial bind is by finishing his new novel in 30 days. As he races against the clock to overcome his writer's block, his stenographer Emma challenges his ideas for the novel's plot, sending both of them on a journey that changes the nature of their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: “The FootLoose” is a recreation of the original movie in 1984, which narrates the story of a young boy “Rayan” who comes back to his village after a long departure, only to find that singing and dancing are no more allowed, because of the tragic death of five teenagers some years ago. Although Rayan falls in love with Ariel, who similarly adores singing and dancing, yet he is shocked again once more when he realizes that her father -the priest- is one of the strongest supporters of the anti singing and dancing decision. Hence the young couple determines to rebel and encourage everyone else to do the same.(n)

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: When a heist goes south and ends in blood, Jimmy takes his adoptive brother Eli and goes on the run from a vengeful criminal. The brothers stumble into more trouble when young Jimmy uses a mysterious weapon to save his brother, attracting the attention of both the FBI and otherworldly figures.(n)

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Following the destruction of his home planet by a blackhole, the 8-day-old alien genius Megamind (Will Ferrell) arrives on Earth. However Megamind does not find much affection among the citizens of Earth and grows up to become quite a bitter individual. In particular Megamind is envious of the attention and praise that is showered on Metro Man (Brad Pitt) who repeatedly saves Metro City.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Five years after Superman left Earth to investigate if Krypton is still intact, he returns to a much-changed world where his former love, Lois Lane, has moved on, and the people of Earth have decided that they do not need Superman.(n)

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: As the last son of Krypton sent to Earth, a young journalist raised by his adoptive parents finds the fate of planet Earth in his hands after an attack. From the writer of "The Dark Knight," director of "300," and producer Christopher Nolan comes this epic Superman reboot.(n)

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguist, Louise Banks, and a theoretical physicist, Ian Donnelly are asked by US Army Colonel Weber to join a team to find out why twelve extraterrestrial spacecrafts have appeared across the Earth. Banks makes contact with two seven-limped aliens and starts to learn their language of complicated circular symbols. As mankind swings on the verge of global war, Banks and the team race against time for answers which if misinterpreted, could threaten the future of humanity.(n)

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: After his team leaves him behind, Sean catches wind of a dance competition that could change everything for him. He sets out to create a new team, recruiting faces old and new, only to discover that he will be facing off against his old team in the competition.(n)

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Five years after Superman left Earth to investigate if Krypton is still intact, he returns to a much-changed world where his former love, Lois Lane, has moved on, and the people of Earth have decided that they do not need Superman.(n)

Banks makes contact with two seven-limped aliens and starts to learn their language of complicated circular symbols. As mankind swings on the verge of global war, Banks and the team race against time for answers which if misinterpreted, could threaten the future of humanity.(n)

programme.title: Dark Blue
programme.desc: Taking place in Los Angeles 1992, veteran cop Eldon Perry and his rookie partner Bobby Keough are assigned to investigate a high-profile quadruple homicide, which leads them to uncover a series of police corruption while confronting their own demons.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Barney Ross leads a team of skilled mercenaries to assassinate a merciless dictator of a small South American island, only to find themselves caught in a dangerous web of betrayal.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: The Expendables go on a mission presumed to be fairly easy, but it is far from. They face plenty of difficulties that result in a death, which lights a desire for revenge in their hearts from a killer who has enough platinum to change the power structure of the entire world.(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) finds himself face to face against Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson) the Expendables co-founder who betrayed him. Now Conrad has become one of the toughest criminals, Barney recruits a new generation for the team to help him eliminate his arch enemy.(n)

programme.title: The Wolfman
programme.desc: In this 2010 remake of the horror fiction classic Benicio Del Toro and Anthony Hopkins come together to revive an old legend. Upon learning of his brother’s sudden disappearance Lawrence Talbot (Benicio Del Toro) returns with his brother’s fiancé to the ancestral family home in Blackmoor. Upon arriving at Blackmoor he discovers grizzly family secrets that have long been hidden.(n)

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Following the destruction of his home planet by a blackhole, the 8-day-old alien genius Megamind (Will Ferrell) arrives on Earth. However Megamind does not find much affection among the citizens of Earth and grows up to become quite a bitter individual. In particular Megamind is envious of the attention and praise that is showered on Metro Man (Brad Pitt) who repeatedly saves Metro City.(n)

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: Katherine Ann Watson leaves Los Angeles in 1953 to take up a professorship at Wellesley College, a conservative school for girls, where the art history teacher tries to push her students to open up and think free.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. When the lift's doors open, Thomas finds himself surrounded by kids who welcome him to the Glade, a large maze enclosed by stone walls, and just like Thomas, the Gladers don't know why or how they got to the Glade, and they all must escape the deadly-creatures-infested place.

programme.title: That Awkward Moment
programme.desc: Three best friends find themselves in that awkward moment in dating relationships when one asks himself : Where will this end up? Is this official or just a fling? Will we live happily ever after or is it time to call it quits.

programme.title: First Man
programme.desc: A look at the life of Neil Armstrong, the legendary astronaut who was the the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

programme.title: Non-Stop
programme.desc: The movie is set in an international flight from New York to London. During that trip, Bill Marks (Liam Neeson) receives several threats from an unknown threat that every 20 minutes a passenger will be killed unless $ 150 million is transferred to a bank account. The twist occurs when the owner of this account is revealed.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent moves with his daughter to a small town, only to be confronted with the local Meth drug lord. When his daughter becomes at risk, he stops at nothing to protect her.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: An elite assassin, genetically engineered to be the perfect killing machine, known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck; 47, teams up with a young woman, targeting a mega-corporation planning to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers.

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Four waves of increasingly deadly attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Against a backdrop of fear and distrust, 16-year-old Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother. As she prepares for the inevitable and lethal 5th wave, Cassie teams up with a young man who may become her final hope - if she can only trust him.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: An elite assassin, genetically engineered to be the perfect killing machine, known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck; 47, teams up with a young woman, targeting a mega-corporation planning to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers.

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Four waves of increasingly deadly attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Against a backdrop of fear and distrust, 16-year-old Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother. As she prepares for the inevitable and lethal 5th wave, Cassie teams up with a young man who may become her final hope - if she can only trust him.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: As Paul Maguire decides to refrain from any illegal activities, what follows is a peaceful life with his family, marred only when his daughter is kidnapped. Paul then rounds up his old crew and embarks on a journey to find his daughter and exact revenge on the perpetrators.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: Parker is a thief with a moral code. When he is deceived by four guys after a heist and left for dead, he becomes determined to get back at them. Taking on a new identity to infiltrate their gang, he enlists the help of a woman on the inside.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A troubled divorcée gets tangled up in a dangerous web of secrets and lies, after she witnesses something shocking while taking the train.

programme.title: Man on a Ledge
programme.desc: In New York City, Nick Cassidy (actor Sam Worthington) checks in an hotel under a false name. He heads on the top floor, climbs on the ledge and gets ready to suicide. Police arrives and isolate the area, however Nick refuses to talk with anyone except to negotiator Lydia Mercer (actress Elizabeth Banks). Lydia arrives at the hotel room and finds out that Nick is an ex-policeman who was arrested for stealing a $40-million diamond from businessman David Englander (actor Ed Harris). Nick claims innocence and pushes the police to re-investigate in the case. Actually Nick's hidden plan is distracting the policemen while his brother Joey (actor Jamie Bell) and Joey's girlfriend Angie (actress Genesis Rodriguez) break into Englander's upper floor jewelry vault in the building across the street to steal the diamond and prove Nick's innocence.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: An elite assassin, genetically engineered to be the perfect killing machine, known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck; 47, teams up with a young woman, targeting a mega-corporation planning to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers.

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: As a deadly disease called 'The Flare' spreads while Thomas and his friends need to break into the Last City and survive the WKCD troops as well as attacks by zombies, an arduous mission starts into the deadliest of labyrinths.(n)

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: Parker is a thief with a moral code. When he is deceived by four guys after a heist and left for dead, he becomes determined to get back at them. Taking on a new identity to infiltrate their gang, he enlists the help of a woman on the inside.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
programme.desc: In New York, something seems to be behind crimes happening. Police discover a bomb is planted in a school and that the bomb is very sensitive to police radios. Simon Gruber,is the International terrorist behind this and he's planning to steal the Federal Reserve and McClane has to stop him.(n)

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: In the fifth Die Hard installment, John McClane is back and off to Russia to rescue his wayward son, Jack, who turns out to be a CIA operative in trouble. Father and son join forces to prevent nuclear disaster.(n)

programme.title: RED 2
programme.desc: Retired CIA agent Frank (Bruce Willis) reunites his team. They're trying to track down a missing portable nuclear device. The team have to overcome an army of professional killers: terrorists, corrupt government officials, who are also after the weapon.(n)

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: As the vampire death dealer, Selene tries to ward off the brutal attacks of both the Lycans and the Vampire faction that betrayed her, who both strive to get her blood to create a powerful hybrid, she has to work hard with her only two allies, David and Thomas, to stop them and thwart their plot.(n)

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: Three tiny aliens from the planet Floog come to earth and move in with a family in order to study their lives and observe human behaviors.

programme.title: Butterbean's Café S1
programme.desc: The adventures of a fairy named Butterbean who runs the neighborhood café with her friends, as she serves snacks and treats to the residents of Puddlebrook.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The story of a boy and seven small dogs, trying to save people from the problems they create and save the city's inhabitants from dangers.

programme.desc: Shimmer and Shine, are two magical genies, who cause all kinds of hilarious chaos trying to grant their human friend, Leah, her three daily wishes.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: The series is about the adventures and races of monster-truck (Blaze) with his friend (AJ), and its abilities to add pieces to itself to help him in the races.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
programme.desc: 65 years after a masked murderer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, new murders start happening, Is it a copycat or something more evil? A mysterious high school girl might be the only key to catching the murderer.

programme.title: DragonHeart
programme.desc: After inadvertently granting King Einon immortality when he gives him a piece of his heart to heal him, the dragon Draco joins forces with Einon's former mentor, the knight Bowen, as they seek to put an end to Einon's reign of terror as the tyrant king rules his kingdom with fire and blood.

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: When an A.T.F agent is assigned to investigate a terrorist attack, he makes use of a special new technology that enables him to see four days in the past. But can a glimpse into the past help him to stop the perpetrator's next attack in the present.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a future Chicago setting, people are divided into five distinct factions based on their personalities. Beatrice discovers that she is Divergent, meaning she does not fit into any one faction, and soon uncovers a sinister plot brewing in her seemingly perfect society.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Two divers are living a quiet life, but a treasure hunt gets them into trouble with a drug lord after they come upon a missing cargo in a sunken plane.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Jimmy Tong is a cab driver, who with the help of a secretary, gets a job as CIA agent Clark's chauffeur. Clark is then the victim of an assassination attempt, and asks Jimmy to wear his tuxedo.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner teams up with his ex-con friend Roman Pearce and undercover U.S. Customs Service agent Monica Fuentes to bring down Miami's drug lord Carter Verone.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Gramm is a forensic psychologist whose testimony helps convict serial killer Jon Forster. As Forster's execution date looms closer, Gramm receives a call informing him that he only has 88 minutes to live.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: On the eve of the fall of the Berlin wall, spy Lorraine Broughton goes on a mission to bring down the spy network that killed an undercover agent for an unknown reason.

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: When a hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to the medieval days and captured by Lord Arthur, he is tasked with retrieving the Book of the Dead, as he embarks on a most perilous journey to get the Necronomicon that would help the person who has it get a fearsome army of ghouls.

programme.title: Daybreakers
programme.desc: In the wake of a plague that turned most of the population into vampires, the small number of humans remaining means a food shortage that threatens the survival of the vampire race, leading to the enslavement of humans as experiments pick up to find a solution to the growing problem.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A mission to protect a young woman from an evil gang turns into something more when Special Forces agent Lin learns that his missing daughter has become the recipient of a bio-chemical invention, sending him on a quest that uncovers a wider conspiracy.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: David, a teenager with teleportation abilities, finds himself in a local library where he discovers his ability to 'jump' from one place to another. He decides to make use of this newly-acquired ability to leave his abusive father and plan a stable life for himself.

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Two divers are living a quiet life, but a treasure hunt gets them into trouble with a drug lord after they come upon a missing cargo in a sunken plane.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Jimmy Tong is a cab driver, who with the help of a secretary, gets a job as CIA agent Clark's chauffeur. Clark is then the victim of an assassination attempt, and asks Jimmy to wear his tuxedo.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner teams up with his ex-con friend Roman Pearce and undercover U.S. Customs Service agent Monica Fuentes to bring down Miami's drug lord Carter Verone.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost turns out to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is agent Matt Weston (Ryan Reynolds) who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. They must stay out of the gunmen's sight until they get to another safe house.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: As a way to prove himself worthy of marrying Angela, James' sister, security guard Ben joins her cop brother on a day long patrol of Atlanta.

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: As the Cold War is at its peak in October 1963, the American administration discovers that the Soviet Union has deployed nuclear missiles in Cuba, prompting US President Kennedy to intervene. As he leads a political struggle with his team to try to do what's necessary to deal with the imminent danger.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: In the fourth Jason Bourne feature film, a unique agent, Aaron Cross, is enrolled in an enhanced US Defense Department black ops program "Operation Outcome". Agents are given chemical pills to genetically amplify their abilities. After the older programs are publicly exposed, CIA directors are investigated followed by a decision to shut down Outcome and eliminate all its agents and scientists.

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: As he barely escapes a fatal set up by his mobster boss, hitman Ryan finds himself accompanied by Rocky, a young prostitute that he saves, as he tries to find his way back to his hometown to recuperate and plan his revenge.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A group known as the "The Organization." hires a professional hit-man who goes by the name of Agent 47, getting him involved in a political conspiracy involving the Interpol and the Russian army. While attempting to escape through Russia and Eastern Europe, he seems to be strangely affected by a mysterious Russian woman.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: June Havens meets Secret Agent Miller, at the airport by accident. She gets involved with him in a secret operation to protect an energy source that holds the key to infinite power. Things get more complicated when Miller's enemies tell June that Miller suffers from a nervous breakdown.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Robin Longstride along with his band of his mercenaries set out to unite the people of England to stand up to the invading French forces led by King Philip.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.(n)

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: Spencer is an undercover assassin who falls in love with Jen and he decides to retire and marry her. After several years, he finds huge reward to kill him, which makes him doubt everyone around him ,so he hides at Jen's father, who was also an assassin and he tries to help him.(n)

programme.title: Code of Silence
programme.desc: Eddie Cusack is a Chicago police officer who goes on a special mission with his team. When the stakeout unexpectedly turns into a shootout, he finds himself in the middle of a gang war.(n)

programme.title: How It Ends
programme.desc: As an apocalypse hits the globe, a man desperately tries to make it back to his pregnant partner, fighting through the chaos that has taken over everything as he races to return to her.(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: An elite assassin, genetically engineered to be the perfect killing machine, known only by the last two digits on the barcode tattooed on the back of his neck; 47, teams up with a young woman, targeting a mega-corporation planning to unlock the secret of Agent 47's past to create an army of killers.(n)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.(n)

programme.title: Journey’s End
programme.desc: During WWII, nerves fray as a company awaits an upcoming German attack that they desperately try to avoid thinking about, as their leader, Captain Stanhope, crumbles under the pressure and horror of war.

programme.title: Il paradiso delle signore
programme.desc: The story of a poor girl from southern Italy who comes to Milan to escape from her cheating fiancé. She finds a job as a sales representative in a store, but quickly gets into trouble with her manager.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: A young woman, accompanied by her sister and close friend, decide to use their savings to take a trip to Paris but find themselves in Monte Carlo, after one of them is mistaken for a British rich heiress.

programme.title: Knowing
programme.desc: In 1959, children at a school in Massachusetts make drawings representing predictions of the future in a school time capsule that is to be opened fifty years later. Lucinda Embry, places in the capsule a page that is full of unknown numbers. Fifty years later, in 2009, the time capsule is opened and a page of numbers and John Kestler realizes that the it represents numbers of actual disasters.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: In the 1950s LA, Vincennes is a cop whose job is to protect celebrities from intruders and admirers alike. He is assigned to a new case that reveals the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder. Over the course of his investigation, he learns that two of his colleagues are involved in the murder.

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: After her mother Ingrid is sent to prison for poisoning her boyfriend, fifteen-year-old Astrid goes through a long journey through foster homes, as she experiences hardships and love, while she remains in touch with her mother.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.

programme.title: Mother!
programme.desc: When uninvited guests enters their life, a tranquil couple faces nervousness and disorder.

programme.title: Little Man Tate
programme.desc: Fred is a genius in math and reading, but he can't adjust with other children in school, he's slowly isolated from them and finds it difficult to socialize next to those of his age, he gets help from his teacher and his single mom.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: A young British family vacationing in Thailand is suddenly torn apart when the devastating 2004 tsunami tears through their seaside resort. Their devoted search for one another is a testament to the human spirit and the power of family.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a remote town near the edge of the magical land, Tristan promises his beloved that he will search for a fallen star for her, embarking on a journey of magical adventures in the process.

programme.title: The Founder
programme.desc: The true story of how one man, Ray Kroc, turned a burger joint into one of the biggest food-chains in the world, turning McDonald's from a small, albeit popular, walk-up restaurant run by the brothers Mac and Dick McDonald into a franchise worth billions.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: During the Cold War era between the US and the former Soviet Union, the true story of the legendary American chess player Bobby Fischer (Toby Maguire), and the circumstances of his confrontation with his Russian counterpart Boris Spassky (Liev Schreiber) in a high level game of chess.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: When Jessica King mysteriously disappears, the clairvoyant fortune-teller Annie Wilson begins to see visions of her that will lead her to shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: When his father dies, Charlie is shocked when he discovers that he left his fortune to Charlie's autistic savant older brother whom he never knew about. Desperate to get his father's inheritance, Charlie kidnaps Raymond and takes him on a cross-country trip to convince him to give up his inheritance.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: New York City business student Brian Flanagan gets a part-time job as a bartender to support himself. He ends up in Jamaica where he plans to have his own bar, while he falls for the waitress Jordan.

programme.title: Lady Macbeth
programme.desc: Adapted from Nikolai Leskov's Lady Macbeth of the Mtsensk District, the movie depicts the life of a young woman stifled by her marriage of convenience to a man twice her age. Confined and left behind by her husband, she starts a romance with a young man from the estate.

programme.title: The Whole Truth
programme.desc: When a case turns personal for a defense attorney, he has to do everything in his power to save the only son of his widowed friend, Mike, who is accused of killing his rich father. But the trial reveals a lot of dark and hidden secrets about the victim, his wife, and their familial relationships.

programme.title: The Gift

programme.title: The Rest of Us
programme.desc: When her ex-husband dies suddenly, Cami reluctantly steps in to help his new family after his death left them in a dire situation. Inviting them into her home, Cami and her daughter are left to try and deal with their feelings towards the newcomers, as well as their lingering grief.

programme.title: French Kiss
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé goes to Paris for a medical conference, he falls for another girl, which sends Kate after him to get him back. But when she ends up crossing paths with the thief Luc, her life turns upside down.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: Violence and chaos follow a hunter, having found some bodies and a huge amount of heroin, and more than $ 2 million in cash near Rio Grande.

programme.title: I See You
programme.desc: After the disappearance of a young boy, strange occurrences start happening to a small-town detective and his family, as he investigates the case.

programme.title: American Hustle
programme.desc: In the late 1970s, FBI agent Richie DiMaso forces con artists Irving and Sydney to devise an elaborate sting operation on corrupt politicians.

programme.title: Widows
programme.desc: Set in contemporary Chicago, during a period of chaos, four women with nothing in common except a debt left behind by their dead husbands' criminal activities, take fate into their own hands, and conspire to shape a future on their own terms.

programme.title: The Nice Guys
programme.desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, private investigator Holland March (Ryan Gosling) is forced to work with another private eye Jackson Healey (Russell Crowe) to investigate the mysterious death of a porn star and a missing girl.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: Violence and chaos follow a hunter, having found some bodies and a huge amount of heroin, and more than $ 2 million in cash near Rio Grande.

programme.title: I See You
programme.desc: After the disappearance of a young boy, strange occurrences start happening to a small-town detective and his family, as he investigates the case.

programme.title: The Birthday Wish
programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.(n)

programme.title: The Rest of Us
programme.desc: When her ex-husband dies suddenly, Cami reluctantly steps in to help his new family after his death left them in a dire situation. Inviting them into her home, Cami and her daughter are left to try and deal with their feelings towards the newcomers, as well as their lingering grief.(n)

programme.title: The Stalker Club
programme.desc: When a group of teens joins the stalker club, their safety is threatened as a teenage girl becomes the target of a masked stalker when she participates in a dangerous game.(n)

programme.title: French Kiss
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé goes to Paris for a medical conference, he falls for another girl, which sends Kate after him to get him back. But when she ends up crossing paths with the thief Luc, her life turns upside down.(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two childhood best friends become enemies when their weddings coincide on the same day, and each of them refuses to postpone the ceremony.(n)

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: Light of My Life
programme.desc: The journey of a father and daughter, through a society that is dying after an epidemic has killed half the world's population, especially women, and through a series of events that test the human personality, the father seeks to protect his daughter and maintain their friendship.(n)

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.(n)

programme.title: Birdman
programme.desc: Riggan Thomson is an actor with diminishing fame who once played an iconic superhero, he struggles to launch a Broadway play he wrote and wants to direct, while clashing with his family, his career and himself.(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In the 19th century America, deep in the uncharted American wilderness, hunter Hugh Glass is severely injured and left for dead. With sheer will as his only weapon, Glass must navigate a hostile environment, a brutal winter, and warring Native American tribes in a relentless quest to survive.(n)

programme.title: Allied
programme.desc: In 1942 during World War II, Canadian intelligence officer, Max Vatan, is partnered with French Resistance fighter, Marianne Beausejour, in an assasination mission in Casablanca. They fall in love and get married in London after which Max is confronted with an allegation from his superiors that Marianne is a German spy and if proved to be true, Max must execute her. Defying the set plan, Max decides to find out the truth about his wife on his own and endangers his life and those who try to help him in the process.(n)

programme.title: Dark Waters
programme.desc: The true story of how one man stood up against a major corporation after the latter is connected to a number of deaths. Filing a lawsuit against the company, he faces a tremendous amount of pressure as he tries to put a stop to their practices that pollute the environment.(n)

programme.title: About Time
programme.desc: At 21, Tim's father (Bill Nighy) tells him all the men in the family have the ability to time travel. Tim uses his new skill to craft the perfect romance with the girl of his dreams (Rachel McAdams), but his unusual lifestyle comes with unexpected and tragic consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. They're also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.

programme.title: Glee
programme.desc: A high school teachers take over control of the school's glee club, hoping to return it to its Nationals-winning glory. But when only misfits and outcasts answer his call, his club turns into a haven for the small band of ragtag performers.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S2
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldon's deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. They're also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.

programme.desc: A high school teachers take over control of the school's glee club, hoping to return it to its Nationals-winning glory. But when only misfits and outcasts answer his call, his club turns into a haven for the small band of ragtag performers.

programme.desc: The inability to pay off a debt landed Rahim in prison. Over the course of a two-day break, he tries to persuade the lender to drop the lawsuit against the settlement. However, things don't turn out as expected.

programme.desc: Olivia is a bright student and head of her school's cheerleading team who's harboring a scandalous secret. As Olivia starts pulling away from her mother, the latter grows concerned and sets about trying to get to the bottom of the matter, uncovering a shocking truth.

programme.desc: As the aspiring young musician Omar is separated from his Syrian family, he ends up on a remote Scottish island, where he awaits a decision on his asylum claim.

programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Bad Tales
programme.desc: In this cinematic oeuvre, the film follows the lives of several families residing in the suburban part of Rome, seemingly in an affectionate peace, but eventually, everything crumbles down because of their children. A sweet parable of innocence, morality, and mutual influence.

programme.title: Lost Girls and Love Hotels
programme.desc: As she tries to find a way out of her static life and her turbulent past, Margaret's string of meaningless encounters with men comes to an end when she falls for Kazu, an alluring yakuza. But their relationship comes with its own hurdles as their different worlds and tradition stand in their way.

programme.title: Paris, 13th District
programme.desc: A group of intertwined relationships between people who are completely different from each other. They are sometimes friends, other times lovers, and often both.

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: A look into the origins of Snake Eyes and how he made it to being a G.I.

programme.title: Silk Road
programme.desc: The true story of the circumstances that led to the arrest of Ross Ulbricht, a young man who facilitated selling drugs by launching a website on the darknet called Silk Road, sending a DEA agent undercover to gather evidence against him, which enabled his arrest in 2013.

programme.title: South of Heaven
programme.desc: After serving 12 years in prison on charges of armed robbery, Jimmy is released on parole and decides to devote his life to taking care of Annie, his childhood sweetheart, but things take an unexpected turn when Jimmy is offered a side job by his probation officer.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: As Adela and Juan, a Mexican couple, escape the clutches of a drug ring, they end up in Texas, where they come up against a group of desperados, who are determined to make the annual Purge day last forever.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Being the first human being born on Mars, Gardner Elliot reads a lot about Earth, his mother's planet. After 16 years, he is eager to visit Earth to get to experience its wonders himself, hoping to learn how he came into being. Meanwhile, he strikes an online friendship with a girl on Earth.

programme.title: Unknown Dimension: The Story of Paranormal Activity
Paper Spiders
programme.desc: In the wake of losing her husband, Dawn experiences growing anxiety after she learns that her daughter, Melanie, is moving away for college, after which Melanie attempts to help her mother with her paranoid delusions that threaten to jeopardize their loving bond.

programme.title: Judy
programme.desc: Thirty years after her rise to stardom with "The Wizard of Oz", legendary star Judy Garland performs a series of concerts in the winter of 1968 London, as she struggles with managers, musicians charm, childhood memories, friends, fans and her spark that partially faded through the years.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: As the celebrity power couple Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting ready to wed before a global audience of fans, things take a surprising turn when Kat finds out that Bastian cheated on her, so she chooses a stranger from the crowd named Charlie to marry instead.(n)

programme.title: Secrets in the Basement
programme.desc: A blissful couple, Delilah and Shawn, moves to a new house in the suburbs, unaware of the fact that the house's basement is the dwelling of a sinister masked figure.(n)

programme.title: Brutal Bridesmaids
programme.desc: As the soon-to-be bride Jessica begins to notice strange occurrences that are happening to her, she suspects that one of her bridesmaids is behind it.(n)

programme.title: Killer Competition
programme.desc: High school senior Nicole fudges test grades in order to become valedictorian. But things take a horrifying turn, as some students get murdered, and she becomes the main suspect.(n)

programme.title: The Pom Pom Murders
programme.desc: After Audrey gets chosen to be a cheerleader for a basketball team, she falls for a player called Walter, whose cheerleader ex-girlfriend gets murdered. As Walter gets accused of the murder, Audrey sets out on a dicey mission to prove his innocence.(n)

programme.title: The Bad Guys
programme.desc: Following the advice of Professor Marmalade, a gang of criminal animals attempts to be good citizens to avoid serving a sentence, but while they are getting used to their new lifestyle, the city is threatened by a new outlaw.(n)

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: As a war veteran attempts to raise money for his wife's surgery, his adoptive brother talks him into pulling a heist with him, but when their plan miscarries, they end up stealing an ambulance and taking a fatally wounded officer and an EMT as hostages.(n)

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Sidney Prescott returns to Woodsboro, California, when a new murderer appears in the Ghostface mask and attacks a group of teens, in an attempt to unearth the lethal secrets of the town.(n)

Ana

programme.desc: After an incident in which he failed to protect his family, Hutch is unable to deal with the distance it results in, which only fuels his determination to protect a woman when she gets harassed. But as the confrontation earns him the wrath of a drug lord, he fights to protect himself and his family.(n)

programme.desc: A biopic that depicts the life and growth of Aretha Franklin, who started her career as a child singing in her father's church choir, only to grow up into a legendary R&B singer and song-writer.(n)

programme.desc: Taken as a child from his home by the invading Danes, Uhtred grows up among his blood relatives' mortal enemies. programme.title: Ivan the Incredible
programme.desc: The poor child Ivan Olsen is bullied at school, and his father doesn't make him feel special. But his life changes when he finds a magical potion that makes him amazing in everything for one day. He decides to use it to change his father's opinion about him and teach his bullies a lesson.

programme.title: The Wish Fish
programme.desc: Opil is an 8-year-old boy who detests the dish called 'The Wish Fish' that his mother makes. programme.title: Quest for a Heart
programme.desc: The mischievous Rolli befriends Milli, the beautiful elf girl and together they embark on an adventure to the Land of Winter to recover the mythical magical heart and save the Forest of Elves.

programme.title: The Apple & The Worm
programme.desc: The story of narcissistic apple Torben, who, like all the apples in the tree, dreams of being shiny, afraid of anything that disturbs its beauty, and when Torben is infected with a worm ,he gets kicked out. On his journey to get the worm out, he meets other characters who change his life for the better.

programme.desc: Katniss finds herself in District 13 after she literally shatters the game forever, faced with a decision that could sway the fate of her nation. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss reluctantly becomes the symbol of mass revolution against the autocratic Capitol.

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaskan State Trooper Jack Halcombe is on a mission to end the killing spree of a serial killer. When a seventeen year old girl escapes his clutches, she offers key information that sets the manhunt back on track.

programme.title: Apparition
programme.desc: A new app that connects the living to the dead leads a group of young people to The Preston Castle, the site of an old reform school that houses a terrible secret that connects to each of them. The dead prove to be the ultimate guide to a horrific tale of murder and torture.

programme.title: Ninja: Shadow of a Tear
programme.desc: Ninja master Casey Bowman lives his life by a simple creed: trust no one and fight everyone. After his wife is murdered, he vows revenge by any means possible. He tracks the killer from Oskaka to Bangkok to Rangoon, as he puts his training and skills to the ultimate test.

programme.title: Fire with Fire
programme.desc: One day after a grueling day at work, fireman Jeremy Coleman witnesses the murder of a store owner and his son. Coleman is forced to testify against the ruthless criminal Hagen. He enters the Witness Protection Program as he tries to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Rambo, a retired veteran who now catches snakes for local entertainers and chauffeurs locals for a living in Thailand, joins a team heading into war-torn Burma for a rescue mission.

programme.title: Semper Fi
programme.desc: After his brother is imprisoned, a dedicated member of the Marine Corps struggles to maintain his respect for the word of the law when he knows that the sentence was not fair. After a disillusioning tour in Iraq, he resolves to do right by his brother, whatever it takes.

programme.title: Killer Joe
programme.desc: After he finds himself shackled by debt, drug dealer Chris finds that his only way out is by killing his mother to get the insurance sum. Chris seeks help from Killer Joe, who is a professional assassin and a detective, to achieve what he seeks.

programme.title: In the Electric Mist
programme.desc: An investigator has a series of interrogations with friendly Confederate soldiers, investigating the serial killings of local prostitutes and corrupt businessmen.(n)

programme.title: Coriolanus
programme.desc: When Coriolanus the great soldier is banished from Rome, he seeks the help of his sworn enemy, Tullus Aufidius to take his revenge on the city.

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: To foil a terrorist plot by ruthless criminal Castor Troy, FBI Special Agent Sean Archer agrees to undergo a surgical face implant to impersonate Troy physically, only to find that Troy is fighting him back using the same technique.

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: Lucy is a lonely worker at the train station,who secretly like Peter, one of the passengers . Lucy saves his life on Christmas, but then he goes into a coma. His family mistakenly thinks Lucy is his fiancée while his younger brother, Jack, suspects it, despite the whole family's admiration for Lucy.

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Two girlfriends, Cristina and Vicky, one more rooted in sensuality and the other in logic and routine, travel to Barcelona and meet the charming painter Juan Antonio who becomes involved with both of them. Also in the mix is his passionate and unstable ex-wife, Maria.

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: Young boy Pi Patel is left adrift in the ocean after a storm wrecks the ship carrying his family and their zoo animals from India to Canada. He finds himself alone with a zebra, , a hyena and a Bengal tiger and the journey to fight for survival begins.

programme.title: Hampstead
programme.desc: The American widow Emily Walters falls for a guy who lives a rural life while having to deal with the people trying to evict him.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.

programme.title: The Trip to Greece
programme.desc: In the fourth film in The Trip series, actors Rob Brydon and Steve Coogan resume their tradition of trying local cuisine and visiting ancient landmarks as they take a trip from Troy to Ithaca.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.

programme.title: Jonathan
programme.desc: (Jonathan) leaves the office every day at noon, and when he returns home, he goes to sleep, wakes up every morning, finds his breakfast prepared with a video telling him about the second part of his day.

programme.title: Dangerous Minds
programme.desc: Louanne Johnson is an ex-marine turned teacher who breaks up with her husband. Her teacher friend tries to get her a temporary job as a teacher in the same school. Johnson struggles as she tries to deal with her bright but underachieving students.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: When two friends crash the wrong party, they come across a group of girls displaying weird behavior. Among them is Zan, who reveals that she is an alien who has left her species behind.

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: The true story of how newscaster Dan Rather and CBS News head Mary Mapes lost their jobs after airing a segment exposing the truth of then-president George W. Bush's military service.

programme.title: Hope Gap
programme.desc: After 29 years of marriage, Grace's life falls apart after her husband tells her he's leaving her for another, as she tries to adjust to the shocking news, she discovers a new side of herself.

programme.title: Red Sparrow
programme.desc: As former ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited by a Russian intelligence service, she uses seduction to entrap a C.I.A. agent in order to expose a mole.

programme.title: Stuck in Love
programme.desc: An acclaimed writer struggles with getting over his ex-wife, and raising his teenaged children, as they all try to grapple with the complicated thing called love.
